overview:
Kip Knight is President of KnightVision Marketing and a Venture Partner at Thomvest Ventures which specializes in early stage Internet start-ups.

His 30 year career has included senior management and marketing positions with P&G, PepsiCo and eBay. Kip serves on the Board of Directors for Netbase and the Board of Advisors for YottaMark. He also serves as the Dean of the U.S. Marketing Communication College at the U.S. State Department.
